headline: VAT MINI UHV GATE VACUUM VALVE, CF 40 MM
description: Mini UHV Gate Vacuum Valve With Special valve gate, suitable to install various foils or orifices
specstable:
Manufacturer VAT
Model 01032-CE24
Valve Actuation Pneumatic

Position Indicator YES
Other Information
Special valve gate, suitable to install various foils or orifices, click "other images"
